main event: A bright light was observed moving in a northwesterly direction over Albuquerque, New Mexico, on the evening of March 8, 1959.
interesting points: The object was observed moving faster than any known aircraft,It left no vapor trail or sound,The sighting lasted approximately 2 minutes,Multiple witnesses included local police and Air Force personnel,The incident was classified as 'UNIDENTIFIED' by Project Blue Book.
sighted object: a very bright light in the sky
witness description: Albuquerque police and Air Force personnel
